name: The leeching necklace of the Jell-o (o-1)
data: It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It increases the users wisdom unnoticably.
It increases the users intelligence unnoticably.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The balance between experience and spellcasting powers can be adjusted with the dial.
